detailedOverlap.questionText: The traditional handicrafts ____ (make) by local artisans are very popular among tourists.
A survey of students ____ (carry) out by the school shows that most of them prefer outdoor activities.
The children played in the garden, ____ (laugh) and chatting happily.
When we received a letter ____ (inform) us of the good news, we were very excited.
When he noticed a small child dangling from a fifth - floor window, Jack rushed fifty metres, leaped over a 1 - metre barrier, and stretched out his hands to catch the ____ (plunging) child.
When she spotted a kitten teetering on the edge of a high - rise rooftop, Lily dashed twenty metres, hurdled over a 0.8 - metre railing, and reached out her hands to grab the ____ (fall) kitten.
